biography.summary: Steve Daines is the senior United States Senator from Montana, serving since 2015 after previously serving in the U.S. House (2013-2015). He is a Republican who focuses on economic growth, energy development, agriculture, and national security.

contact.office_address: 320 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

policy_positions.stance: Support domestic energy development and pipelines

timeline.event: Elected to U.S. House of Representatives from Montana's at-large district
Elected to the U.S. Senate from Montana; began serving as Senator
Re-elected to the Senate for term starting in 2021
